original_text: And the priest gave to the captains the spears and shields that had been King David's, which were in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장이 여호와의 성전에 있는 다윗 왕의 창과 방패를 백부장들에게 주니

sentences.original_text: And the priest gave to the captains the spears and shields
which were in the house of the Lord.
